title: Coffee Cakes (Brioche

ingredients_lines.text: 44 cup yolks of eggs. 2 yeast cakes,
4g cup whole eggs. 4g teaspoon extract lemon, or
they are dissolved add remaining ingredients, and beat
thoroughly with hand ten minutes\1 let rise six hours. Keep
in ice-box over night; in morning turn on floured board.
